name: Chemical Industries Association
goal: The CIA represents the collective views of chemical and pharmaceutical companies in the UK and advises those companies on collective matters of relevance.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Europe 2020, animal testing, biocides, pesticides, chemical safety, economy, energy, climate change, employment, general EU affairs, health & safety, environment, trade & business, Brexit.
